summary: Add a new gothic style armor to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Mod name: The GothicSuit.
Mod author: TheBlitz77.

-----------------
About this mod:

This mod add a new set of High Resolution Light Armor to the gameÂ (ONLY FEMALE/Only 7B body), you can improve the armor and you can add enchantments as well , and it is very gothic style.

Q-How can i get it??
A-Craftable section Leather.

Q-Where/when can i get it??
A-Craftable at any forge, from 00h00 to 6h00AM, better to have 3 or 4 linen wrap and some vampire dust in your inventory.

Q-Why is my beast race cannot wear the hood??
A-Understand that the hood was created for human races only.

------------------
Installation:

Extract the contents(including folders) into your Skyrim game folder.

------------------
Uninstallation:

Uncheck the Esp first then supprime these files and the Esp of course, located in:
-Data/Meshes/TheBlitz/GothicSuit.
-Data/Textures/TheBlitz/GothicSuit.
-Data/Textures/cubemaps/BlackSnake_e.
-Data/GothicSuit.esp.

------------------
Require:

-BBP compatible skeleton, Better to use XP32 Maximum Skeleton (for my part i use XP32 Extended).
-SevenBase Body (any version).

------------------
Permissions:

I don't want any part of this mod being modified and/or used in other mods and games without asking me first.

------------------
Credits:

Mr.LABTECH for his good advices.
Narilda for the armor name.
Bethesda for TESV.
dimon99 for the UNP body
Crosscrusade, DeMoNhUnTeR1986, Sevennity, Wast1980 for SevenBase

------------------
As you know modding is very time consuming and i spend many hours working on this set so in return i'd like to recieve kudos and endorsements from those who like this kind of armors.

Thank you.
author: TheBlitz77
